# ARPlaneAnchor.Alignment.horizontal

**Case**

The plane is perpendicular to gravity.

## Declaration

```swift
case horizontal
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARAnchor/transform] property for a horizontal plane anchor includes no rotation about the x- or z-axis. Thus, using this anchor’s transform to place a 3D model asset in your scene results in the model appearing “right side up”.

## Alignment Values

- **ARPlaneAnchor.Alignment.vertical**: The plane is parallel to gravity.
